Package Hotel

Class Hotel

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hotel.Hotel
  • public class Hotel
extends java.lang.Object
    The Hotel class represents a hotel with rooms and reservations.

    • Field Summary

      static int MAX_ROOMS

      • Hotel

        public Hotel​(java.lang.String name)
        Constructs a Hotel object with a given name. Initializes roomList and reservationList. Also initializes rooms in the hotel.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the hotel

        public Room getRoom​(java.lang.String roomName)
        Retrieves a room from the hotel's roomList given its name.
        Parameters:
        roomName - the name of the room to retrieve
        Returns:
        the room object with the specified name, or null if no such room exists

      • getReservation

        public Reservation getReservation​(Room room,
                                  java.time.LocalDate checkInDate)
        Retrieves a reservation for a specific room and check-in date.
        Parameters:
        room - the room to check for reservations
        checkInDate - the check-in date of the reservation
        Returns:
        the reservation object, or null if no reservation exists for the specified room and date

      • getRoomInfo

        public java.lang.String getRoomInfo​(Room room)
        Retrieves information about a specific room in the hotel.
        Parameters:
        room - the room to retrieve information for
        Returns:
        information about the room, including base price and available dates

      • setName

        public void setName​(java.lang.String name)
        Sets the name of the hotel.
        Parameters:
        name - the new name for the hotel

      • setRoomBasePrice

        public boolean setRoomBasePrice​(double newPrice)
        Sets the base price per night for all rooms in the hotel if there are no reservations.
        Parameters:
        newPrice - the new base price per night
        Returns:
        true if the base price was successfully set, false otherwise

        Parameters:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • addRoom

        public Room addRoom​(java.lang.String name)
        Adds a room.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updatePrice

        public Result updatePrice​(double price)
        Updates the base price per night for all rooms in the room list.
        Parameters:
        price - the new base price to set for each room
        Returns:
         a Result object indicating the outcome of the operation:
      - "Reservation list is empty." if there are existing reservations
      - "Price is lower than 100." if the provided price is less than 100
      - "Base price set." if the price was successfully updated

      • 

        removeRoom
        

        public Result removeRoom​(java.lang.String name)
        

        Removes a room from the room list given the room's name.
        

        

        Parameters:
        

        name - the name of the room to remove
        

        Returns:
        

         
 a Result object indicating the outcome of the operation:
 - "Removal successful." if the room was successfully removed
 - "Room has a reservation." if the room has one or more reservations
 - "Room does not exist." if the room with the specified name is not found
